common.thankYou: Thank you for your purchase at FortLoot!
common.support: If you have questions, contact support.

paymentUploaded.subject: New Payment Proof - Order {{orderNumber}}
paymentUploaded.title: New Payment Proof Uploaded
paymentUploaded.body: A new payment proof has been uploaded that requires verification.
paymentUploaded.action: Please access the admin panel to verify the payment.

paymentVerified.subject: Payment Verified - Order {{orderNumber}}
paymentVerified.title: Payment Verified!
paymentVerified.body: Your payment has been successfully verified.
paymentVerified.processing: Your order is being processed and will be delivered soon.
paymentVerified.viewOrder: You can check your order status at any time:

paymentRejected.subject: Payment Rejected - Order {{orderNumber}}
paymentRejected.title: Payment Rejected
paymentRejected.body: Your payment proof has been rejected.
paymentRejected.action: Please verify your proof and upload it again with the correct information.

paymentInstructions.subject: Payment Instructions - Order {{orderNumber}}
paymentInstructions.title: Order Created - Payment Instructions
paymentInstructions.body: Your order has been created successfully. Please make the payment following the instructions.
paymentInstructions.important: Important: After making the payment, upload your proof on your order page. The payment will be verified manually.

orderCompleted.subject: Order Completed - {{orderNumber}}
orderCompleted.title: Order Completed!
orderCompleted.body: Your order has been completed and the items have been sent to your Fortnite account.
orderCompleted.action: Check your Fortnite account to see your new items!
orderCompleted.footer: Thank you for trusting FortLoot. We hope to see you soon!

otpCode.subject: Your verification code - FortLoot
otpCode.title: Verification Code
otpCode.body: You have requested to access your purchase history on FortLoot.
otpCode.ignore: If you didn't request this code, you can safely ignore this message.
